00029 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00030 {
00031   createinfo(argc, argv);
00032 
00033   /* enough arguments ? */
00034 
00035   if (argc < 3) {
00036     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s MBSTATEF MBSTATEI\n",
00037             filepart(argv[0]));
00038     exit(-1);
00039   }
00040 
00041   char* mcstatefilef = argv[optind];
00042   char* mcstatefilei = argv[optind+1];
00043   char** mbfilef; char** mbfilei;
00044 
00045   // openm multiconfigfiles 
00046   Projection P;
00047   SlaterDet *Qf, *Qi;
00048   Symmetry *Sf, *Si;
00049   Eigenstates Ef, Ei;
00050   int nf, ni;
00051 
00052   readMulticonfigfile(mcstatefilef, &mbfilef, &P, &Qf, &Sf, &Ef, &nf);
00053   readMulticonfigfile(mcstatefilei, &mbfilei, &P, &Qi, &Si, &Ei, &ni);
00054 
00055   // read or calculate overlap matrix elements
00056 
00057   complex double** ovlme[nf*ni]; 
00058 
00059   int a,b;
00060   for (b=0; b<ni; b++)
00061     for (a=0; a<nf; a++)
00062       ovlme[a + b*nf] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpOvlap);
00063   
00064   for (b=0; b<ni; b++)
00065     for (a=0; a<nf; a++)
00066 
00067       if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfilef[a], mbfilei[b], &P, &OpOvlap, Sf[a], Si[b], 
00068                                     ovlme[a + b*nf])) {
00069         calcprojectedMBME(&P, &OpOvlap, &Qf[a], &Qi[b], Sf[a], Si[b], ovlme[a + b*nf]);
00070         writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbfilef[a], mbfilei[b], &P, &OpOvlap, Sf[a], Si[b], 
00071                                  ovlme[a + b*nf]);
00072       }
00073   
00074 
00075   // calculate many-body overlaps
00076   complex double**** ovltrans = initprojectedtransitionVector(&P, &OpOvlap, nf, ni);
00077   calctransitionprojectedMBME(&P, &OpOvlap, ovlme, Sf, Si, &Ef, &Ei, ovltrans);
00078 
00079   // output
00080 
00081   writeprojectedtransitionOvlap(stdout, &P, ovltrans, &Ef, &Ei);
00082 
00083   return 0;
00084 }
